i want to compile wine, however this is a patch for a specific problem in a game i use that  iwant to apply before compiling
cd /wherever/the/wine/source/is -- then cp blahblahblah.diff `pwd` -- then patch -p1 blahblahblah.diff

basic steps 1. extract the source code 2. cd into the top directory of the source code -- for wine, its usually wine-0.version.number 3. copy the patch diff file to this directory 4. type patch -p1 < nameoffile.diff 5. ./configure and etc..
